mapper.select: SELECT sc.session_id,sc.supervisor_id, s.name AS supervisor_name,sc.consultant_id,c.name AS consultant_name,sc.request_time FROM SupervisorConsultations sc JOIN Supervisors s ON sc.supervisor_id = s.supervisor_id JOIN Consultants c ON sc.consultant_id = c.consultant_id WHERE sc.response_time IS NULL AND sc.request_time <= NOW() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE
